message.body: Sorry, I missed your message. I wish I could! Did you find something?
A week ago, I was looking for 1 bedrooms and the landlord decided to show me a 2 bedroom/2 bathroom just cause she thought it was awesome. And it was seriously awesome.
All hardwood floors, new everything, 2 floors with the bedrooms split on opposite ends of the building, a parking spot in the back and lots of street parking in a nicer area.
$1600 per month, which is the same as what I'm paying now after you split it.
So I've been trying to get a roommate for the place.
Oh gosh, well that's great! But yeah, I guess it's a bit more expensive... Is there anyone at work you're close to?
Not at work. I tried my friends here, and we might be able to work something out, but I'm not sure yet.
I hope it works out! You deserve to get the one you really like.
If only you could be here!
But your house is more fabulous than the apartment.
Maybe I should be there instead.
Hahaha, it'd be fun to be roomies! But I wouldn't be able to help you much on the rent without a full time job. Well, we do have a guest room. You could
And then I'd get to see Chase everyday. That'd be the good life~
He'd love that. He likes that you sit down with home on the pillow. :)
